title: 141 - Ronny Appleseed
description: On today's show, the boys chat about Mansury's experience with Danny Tamberelli of Nickelodeon and Mighty Ducks fame at a Dave Matthews concert circa 2002, and jump right into the Pod FOD that includes things like the best booze to drink straight, Gumpy acting like Tom Cruise in Cocktail after hours years ago, an unusual looking plant that has been sprouting up in Madagascar and where it might have come from, a Spider-Man impersonator ruining a young kid's birthday party, video of crocodiles in the water that might shock you, people finding what is assumed to be the first mass grave for T-Rex skeletons which begs the question, was there a different Apex predator, and more. Don't forget to subscribe to Youtube.com/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and send your submissions to the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you for listening, we'll see you Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
